meanings.definition: The state of being triple or threefold.
meanings.sent1: The triplicity of the three colors in the flag is striking.
meanings.sent2: The triplicity of the three siblings made them a strong team.
meanings.sent3: The triplicity of the three clowns brought laughter to the circus.
meanings.sent4: The triplicity of the three keys unlocked the mystery of the old chest.
meanings.sent5: The triplicity of the three flavors in the ice cream made it delicious.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three.
meanings.sent1: The triplicity of the birds on the branch was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The triplicity of the musketeers made them a formidable trio.
meanings.sent3: The triplicity of the kittens playing in the yard was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The triplicity of the primary colors is essential in art.
meanings.sent5: The triplicity of the three books on the shelf caught my eye.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being threefold or triple.
meanings.sent1: The triplicity of the melody in the song was enchanting.
meanings.sent2: The triplicity of the tasks overwhelmed him.
meanings.sent3: The triplicity of the jokes in the show kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent4: The triplicity of the challenges tested her resilience.
meanings.sent5: The triplicity of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
